text: @realDonaldTrump And how long did you wait to begin wide testing in the first place? How many ppl DIED b/c u didn't take COVID19 seriously & said like flu it would magically disappear? How many deaths it took to FINALLY CONVINCE U tht u had to do something? Also, um, testing is not a competition!
